Title: Le due vite di Mattia Pascal
Writer: Suso Cecchi D'Amico (screenplay), Ennio De Concini (screenplay), Mario Monicelli (screenplay), Luigi Pirandello (novel), Amanzio Todini (screenplay)
Actors: Marcello Mastroianni, Senta Berger, Flavio Bucci, Laura Morante
Plot: Unlike in the previous 3 adaptations of the book,here Mattia narrates in flashback,back at his library job in his village,how he changed his name when mistakenly thought dead and tried to start a new life in Rome.
Country: Italy, France, West Germany, Spain, UK
